Articles.Content:
This is my first challenge, but it seemed cool.

Fly a ship to each of Jools moons, and then head to Eeloo.

BUT....

You have to do all of

This in

ONE LAUNCH

- - - Updated - - -

Also for bonus points, fly through Jools core (If its possible)
flying through jool's core summons the kraken, and also if you do it, your craft will be destroyed.

I like how when I scroll over this post in the challenges section it says "Inb4 locked post."

I'm assuming that's a mod that's somehow done that. Props.

Regardless, you might want to check out the Challenge Submission Guide. This isn't super original, nor necessarily super fun for a lot of people. There's little detail on what we should and shouldn't do. How do we win? Can we? How is this challenged scored?

Edited January 18, 2015 by Jodo42
Its not scored, just to see if its possible

just to see if its possible

it is posible, i think that if i added more fuel to my jool-5 mothership, it could be done, but i am re-doing the jool-5, so i might try it

Uh, "fly a ship to each of Jool's moons"

Needs more clarifications, do we need to enter it's sphere of influence? Achieve orbit? Land?

It could mean a lot of things.

Welcome to the Forum!

It's also the done thing to check if the challenge already exists - you obviously did not check! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57197-The-Ultimate-Jool-5-Challenge-land-Kerbals-on-all-moons-and-return-in-one-big-mission
This challenge doesn't exist, clearly you didn't read it

The Jool 5 challenge has already been done, with much more clarity in the thread mentioned. You can't fly through Jool's core without destroying your ship btw. Also, please read the challenge sub-forum rules before creating a challenge.
It is usually adviced to try your own challenges before posting, before posting just to see if it's possible (and you clearly haven't). Just something to keep in mind next time.

It's not jool 5!

- - - Updated - - -

Also I'm really bad at kerbal space program. I haven't even landed on the moon

Uh, "fly a ship to each of Jool's moons"

Needs more clarifications, do we need to enter it's sphere of influence? Achieve orbit? Land?

It could mean a lot of things.

Given the title, it probably means the requirements of the Jool 5 challenge.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, I'm really bad at Kerbal Space Program. I haven't even landed on the moon Mun

Fixed that for you. Advice: Don't make challenges until you've landed on Duna. This is not just out of some kind of thing about annoying users posting dumb challenges or anything, it's actual advice that would have helped me in my early days as a KSP'er. People think you're dumb if you make a challenge thread that's a few sentences long with very loose rules. But you're probably not dumb, so you have to meet the not-dumb standard. Also, use as proper grammar and punctuation as possible. And for the names of things: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104282-How-to-refer-to-things-correctly

Edited January 21, 2015 by GregroxMun
